name: e-Ro 2017
description:
Prize: "Best Game Design" Aniwow 2017

Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL MONTREAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

E-Ro is a puzzle-infiltration game with platformer features. As a highly mobile little robot, analyze the enemies' patterns and make your way through the puzzles. 

Progress carefully as any mistake could lead to your death, your only weapon is the Miasma you carry along, and you better spend it wisely.

Platform : PC /  Engine:  Unity 3D
Number of players : 1

Producer: Camille EMERY
Game Design: Maxence-Richard GALAN SAMINAN, Xavier POUILLOT, Julien ROYER
Game Artist: Amandine AGULLO, Jean-François HUARD, Pierre-Henri PAITRE
